get.description: Returns the balance for a specified address.

parameters.description:
chain network id, 
    see [list of details](https://docs.chainbase.com/reference/supported-chains)

schema.title: Chain Id
schema.description:
chain network id, 
    see [list of details](https://docs.chainbase.com/reference/supported-chains)

parameters.name: chain_id

parameters.description: A hex string referencing a wallet address

schema.title: Address
schema.description: A hex string referencing a wallet address

parameters.name: address

parameters.description: block decimal number, hex number or 'latest'

schema.title: To Block
schema.description: block decimal number, hex number or 'latest'

parameters.name: to_block

get.description:
Retrieve all token balances for all ERC20 tokens for a specified address.

By default, it will return all token balances for all ERC20 tokens that the address has ever received.
You can specify a contract address to check the balance of a non-standard contract.

parameters.description:
chain network id, 
    see [list of details](https://docs.chainbase.com/reference/supported-chains)

schema.title: Chain Id
schema.description:
chain network id, 
    see [list of details](https://docs.chainbase.com/reference/supported-chains)

parameters.name: chain_id

parameters.description: A hex string referencing a wallet address

schema.title: Address
schema.description: A hex string referencing a wallet address

parameters.name: address

parameters.description: The address of the token contract

schema.title: Contract Address
schema.description: The address of the token contract

parameters.name: contract_address

parameters.description: block decimal number, hex number or 'latest'

schema.title: To Block
schema.description: block decimal number, hex number or 'latest'

parameters.name: to_block

parameters.description: The desired page size limit. Less or equal than 100

schema.title: Limit
schema.description: The desired page size limit. Less or equal than 100

parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: The page offset

schema.title: Page
schema.description: The page offset

parameters.name: page
